snippet: Economic recovery in Europe requires action both on the demand and supply sides and persistence with structural reforms, European Central Bank Executive Board member Benoit Coeure said on Thursday....

headline.print_headline: ECB's Coeure Says Action Needed for Euro Zone Recovery
headline.main: ECB's Coeure Says Action Needed for Euro Zone Recovery

lead_paragraph: Economic recovery in Europe requires action both on the demand and supply sides and persistence with structural reforms, European Central Bank Executive Board member Benoit Coeure said on Thursday.
